com.salesforce.omakase.parser.token

Class SimpleToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.omakase.parser.token.SimpleToken
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Token

    public final class SimpleToken
extends Object
implements Token
    Mainly for use with custom GrammarPlugins that need to specify additional characters not already covered by Tokens.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleToken(char token)
      Creates a new instance matching the given character.
      SimpleToken(char token, String description)
      Creates a new instance matching the given character and with the given description.

        Creates a new instance matching the given character.

      • SimpleToken

        public SimpleToken(char token,
                   String description)
        Creates a new instance matching the given character and with the given description.
        Parameters:
        token - The character.
        description - A description of the token for use in certain error messages. See examples in Tokens.

        Description copied from interface: Token
        Whether the given character matchers this Token.

        Parameters:
        c - Compare to this character.
        Returns:
        true if this token matches the given character.

      • description

        public String description()
        Description copied from interface: Token
        Gets a description of the token. This is used in error-reporting to indicate what was expected.

        The description.

      • or

        public Token or(Token other)
        Description copied from interface: Token
        A Utility to create a new CompoundToken, combining this Token with another one. This is useful for OR character comparisons.
        Specified by:
        or in interface Token
        Parameters:
        other - The other Token.
        Returns:
        A CompoundToken instance.
